emphasizes layered understanding, moving from high-level framing to the specific tactics that make

post_assessment.question: Which statement best captures the heart of objective 1 for OPSEC for Red Teams?
options: Rely on tools without articulating the intended business outcome.
Operate in silos even when the workflow depends on other teams.
Skip documentation because the situation felt time-sensitive.
post_assessment.explanation: The first option restates the intended behavior for Master operational security principles. The remaining responses highlight anti-patterns that sabotage adoption.
